com.camerontec.util.collection

Class StandaloneCollectionRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.collection.AbstractCollectionRegistry
      • com.camerontec.util.collection.StandaloneCollectionRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollectionRegistry
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DistributedCollectionRegistry

    public class StandaloneCollectionRegistry
extends AbstractCollectionRegistry
    ICollectionRegistry implementation used in standalone (i.e. non-replicated) mode.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  StandaloneCollectionRegistry.CollectionBytesCacheMXBean
      An instance of this interface get optionally registered when opening a collection that makes use of a bytes cache.

        protected String validateCollectionProperties(String collectionName,
                                              Properties collectionProperties)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCollectionRegistry
        Validation of collection name and properties when retrieving existent collection. If validation failed the collection would not be returned.
        Specified by:
        validateCollectionProperties in class AbstractCollectionRegistry
        Parameters:
        collectionName - collection name
        collectionProperties - collection properties
        Returns:
        Error message in case of validation failed, null otherwise

      • createList

        protected <E> List<E> createList(String name,
                                 Properties properties,
                                 IBytesSegmentExternalizer<E> elementExternalizer,
                                 ProgressReporter progressReporter)
                          throws IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractCollectionRegistry
        Create a new list.

        This method is guaranteed to be called whenever a new list is required.

        Specified by:
        createList in class AbstractCollectionRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        E - The element type.
        Parameters:
        name - The name under which the list will be bound to the registry.

        progressReporter - Progress reporter.
        Returns:
        The new list.
        Throws:

      • createPersistentListStore

        protected JournalingPersistentStoreBase createPersistentListStore(String name,
                                                                  Properties properties,
                                                                  JournalingPersistentStoreProgressReporter progressReporter)
        Creates a new persistent list store with the given properties.

        This default implementation creates a standalone (i.e. non HA aware) persistent store. Subclasses wishing to provide different types of persistent stores may override this method in order to provide an implementation with the desired features.

        Parameters:
        name - the persistent list store's name
        properties - the persistent list store properties
        progressReporter - progress reporter for list scan and compact operations
        Returns:
        a new persistent list store

      • createPersistentMapStore

        protected MappedJournalingPersistentStore createPersistentMapStore(String name,
                                                                   Properties properties,
                                                                   JournalingPersistentStoreProgressReporter progressReporter)
        Creates a new persistent map store with the given properties.

        This default implementation creates a standalone (i.e. non HA aware) persistent store. Subclasses wishing to provide different types of persistent stores may override this method in order to provide an implementation with the desired features.

        Parameters:
        name - the persistent map store's name
        properties - the persistent map store properties
        progressReporter - progress reporter for map scan and compact operations
        Returns:
        a new persistent map store

      • createExternallyIndexedPersistentStore

        protected ExternallyIndexedJournalingPersistentStore createExternallyIndexedPersistentStore(Properties properties,
                                                                                            JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer indexer)
        Creates a new externally indexed persistent store with the given properties.

        This default implementation creates a standalone (i.e. non HA aware) persistent store. Subclasses wishing to provide different types of persistent stores may override this method in order to provide an implementation with the desired features.

        Parameters:
        properties - the persistent store's properties
        indexer - the persistent store's indexer
        Returns:
        a new ExternallyIndexedJournalingPersistentStore instance

      • createBackingStore

        protected IByteArrayStore createBackingStore(String name,
                                             Properties properties,
                                             IPersistentByteArrayStore persistentStore,
                                             IJournalingStoreAccessor journalAccessor,
                                             IByteArrayStoreUpdateListener updateListener)
                                      throws IOException
        Create a backing store based on the specified properties and persistent store.

        This default implementation creates a standalone (i.e. non HA aware) backing store. Subclasses wishing to provide different types of backing stores may override this method in order to provide an implementation with the desired features.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the collection for which the backing store is created
        properties - The backing store properties.
        persistentStore - The underlying persistent store.
        journalAccessor - journal accessor
        updateListener - update listener
        Returns:
        The new backing store.
        Throws:
        IOException - On error creating the backing store.
